name: online-bookstore
description: CS 665 Database Project - Online Bookstore Management System

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.setup:env: echo Creating environment files... && copy backend\.env.example backend\.env && copy frontend\.env.example frontend\.env
scripts.setup:db: echo Please run: psql -U your_username -d bookstore_db -f schema.sql
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env

author: CS 665 Student
